intro:
Spin to connect! Let your brain travel the world.
— A new rotating puzzle brain-training game themed on World Heritage —
description:
Kurukuru Puzzle World Heritage — Spin and Spark! is a rotating puzzle game that uses beautiful photos of world heritage sites from around the world.

Split the images into 3×3, 4×4 grids and rotate each piece until it faces the correct direction to complete the puzzle!
Train concentration, spatial recognition, and inspiration while learning about world heritage.

Travel the world in your mind and boost your creativity through play!
A relaxing brain-training game enjoyable for both adults and children.
